item.description:
ARRIVE EARLY BEFORE WOBURN HALLOWEEN PARADE ROAD CLOSURES AT 12:30pm. MAIN STREET WILL BE CLOSED> ADVICE IS TO ARRIVE AT NOON USING RT 128 EXIT 38 before closed.

UPDATE: Participating Groups are host Red Sox Natives, Boston Happy Hour, Wakefield weeknights and Beantown and Beyond.

We're getting together with the Red Sox Natives Meet Up group for a fun Pats viewing party! Join us at Scoreboard for a Patriots Game Viewing Party to watch the the New England Patriots take on the St. Louis Rams on Sunday, October 28.

Arrive early at 12:30pm to get yourself a prime seat and enjoy some pre-game socializing. This will be an informal gathering in the bar area. We strongly suggest that fans arrive early and put in for a table if you want seats or just move around the bar area and enjoy the mayhem. We will look into a table reservation based on RSVPs a few days before the game.

Game Time is 1:00pm.

The Red Sox Natives organized weekly viewing parties last year with guests from several other invited groups attending. We had a blast with up to 80 people attending at various locations in Boston, Woburn and Wakefield.

Scoreboard has been one of our venues for watching Patriots, Red Sox, Bruins and Celtics games over the past several years.

If you have never been to Scoreboard, it is located at 15 Middlesex Canal Park next to the Holiday Inn and Showcase Cinema off Route 128 in Woburn. Scoreboard has over 30 High Definition and Plasma TVs ranging in size from 50 to 92 inches. Parking is free. More info at http://www.tpsscoreboard.com.

Everyone is responsible for their own food and drinks. PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER AND TIP YOUR SERVERS.

Space is limited.

.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Frank from the Red Sox Natives meet up group- they will be a large group in the bar area. Ask the hostess to direct you to the Meet Up group.
item.name: Pats Viewing Party, Woburn: Joint Event with Red Sox Natives Group
